descs.value: frightened 1 (but still unaffected on a critical success)

name: Ki Blast
shortDesc: You unleash your ki as a powerful blast of force.
desc: You unleash your ki as a powerful blast of force that deals |dice=var1 Force| <var>var1</var> force damage. If you use 2 actions to cast ki blast, increase the size of the cone to 30 feet and the damage to |dice=var2 Force| <var>var2</var>. If you use 3 actions to cast ki blast, increase the size of the cone to 60 feet and the damage to |dice=var3 Force| <var>var3</var>. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw.
success: The creature takes half damage.
failure: The creature takes full damage and is pushed 5 feet.
critfailure: The creature takes double damage and is pushed 10 feet.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 1d6, or by 2d6 if you use 2 or 3 actions.

name: Litany Against Wrath
shortDesc: Your litany rails against the sin of wrath, punishing the target for attacking good creatures.

name: Swamp of Sloth
shortDesc: Ground in the area turns swampy and fetid.
desc: <var>var1</var>Ground in the area turns swampy and fetid. The area is difficult terrain. The sludge at the bottom of the morass animates into diminutive sludge beasts that have a demonic appearance. These don't function as normal creatures, but they swarm over creatures in the swamp and exude a noxious stench. The swamp deals |dice=var2 Poison| <var>var2</var> poison damage; creatures that end their turn in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save. You can increase the number of actions it takes to Cast the Spell. For each additional action, increase the burst's radius by 5 feet.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 1d6, and the initial radius increases by 5 feet.

name: Abundant Step
shortDesc: You move so fast you blur across planar boundaries.
desc: You move so fast you blur across planar boundaries. You teleport up to a distance equal to your Speed within your line of sight.

name: Adaptive Ablation
shortDesc: You shift yourself to adapt to the mystical wavelengths of the energy damage, protecting yourself from further harm.

name: Artistic Flourish
shortDesc: You transform the target to make it match your artisanal and artistic vision.

name: Asterism
shortDesc: Lines of burning starlight form a constellation around you.

name: Bottle the Storm
shortDesc: When lightning is turned at you, you store the charge safely within yourself, unleashing it when the time is right.

name: Captivating Adoration
shortDesc: You become intensely entrancing, and creatures are distracted by you as long as they remain within the area.

name: Commanding Lash
shortDesc: With the threat of more pain, you compel a creature you've recently harmed.

name: Competitive Edge
shortDesc: Your competitiveness drives you to prove yourself against the opposition.

name: Darkened Eyes
shortDesc: You infuse a creature's vision with darkness.

name: Delusional Pride
shortDesc: You make the target overconfident, leading it to ascribe failure to external factors.

name: Destructive Aura
shortDesc: Swirling sands of divine devastation surround you, weakening the defenses of all they touch.

name: Diamond Dust
shortDesc: You supercool the nearby air, forming a cloud of dancing ice crystals in an emanation around you.

name: Dimensional Steps
shortDesc: You teleport a short distance.
desc: You teleport to a location up to <var>var1</var> feet away within your line of sight.

heightened.desc: The distance you can teleport increases by 5 feet.

name: Disperse Into Air
shortDesc: After taking the triggering damage, you transform into air.

name: Door to Beyond
shortDesc: Striking at thin air, you create hairline cracks in an unoccupied adjacent space that lead somewhere outside reality.

name: Downpour
shortDesc: You call forth a torrential downpour, which extinguishes nonmagical flames.

name: Dread Aura
shortDesc: You emit an aura of terror.
desc: You emit an aura of terror. Foes in the area are frightened 1 and unable to reduce the condition.

name: Dreamer's Call
shortDesc: The target becomes distracted and suggestible, inundated by vivid daydreams.

name: Dust Storm
shortDesc: You call forth a swirling storm of dust.

name: Dutiful Challenge
shortDesc: As you challenge an enemy, you take some of its attention away from your allies.

name: Ectoplasmic Interstice
shortDesc: You force the Material and Ethereal Planes to partially overlap, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures.

name: Elemental Tempest
shortDesc: Your spellcasting surrounds you in a storm of elemental energy.
desc: Your spellcasting surrounds you in a storm of elemental energy. If the next action you take is to Cast a Spell from your wizard spell slots that's an evocation spell dealing acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage, a 10-foot emanation of energy surrounds you as you cast the spell. Foes in the area take |dice=1d6| 1d6 damage per spell level of the spell you just cast of the same damage type the spell deals (choose one if it deals multiple types). Combine the damage from both elemental tempest and the other spell against foes who take damage from both before applying bonuses, penalties, resistance, weakness, and the like.

name: Enduring Might
shortDesc: Your own might mingles with divine power to protect you.

name: Energy Absorption
shortDesc: You quickly gain resistance to an energy type of your choice.
trigger: An effect would deal acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage to you.
desc: You gain resistance <var>var1</var> to acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage from the triggering effect (one type of your choice). The resistance applies only to the triggering effect's initial damage.

heightened.desc: The resistance increases by 5.

name: Ephemeral Hazards
shortDesc: You create illusory hazards, such as spinning blades or a puddle of acid, in four 10-foot-by-10-foot spaces within range.

name: Eradicate Undeath
shortDesc: A massive deluge of life energy causes the undead to fall apart.

name: Fallow Field
shortDesc: A sickly yellow light fills the area as entropic forces prevent healing.

name: Fearful Feast
shortDesc: You open your mouth wide and inhale sharply; you draw in the bravery, self-confidence, and hope to which the frightened target clings and then strip away the target's false assumption that these fragile emotions can save them from the oblivion of terror.

name: Flame Barrier
shortDesc: You swiftly deflect incoming flames.

name: Font of Serenity
shortDesc: A divine beacon radiates serenity, soothing nearby allies.

name: Foul Miasma
shortDesc: You multiply the disease within a creature, drawing it into an infectious mist outside their body where it can spread to other creatures.

name: Ghostly Transcription
shortDesc: Glowing letters assemble in the air, providing a transcription of the target's speech in all languages you speak.

name: Glimpse the Truth
shortDesc: Divine insight lets you see things as they truly are.

name: Inspire Heroics
shortDesc: You call upon your muse to greatly increase the benefits you provide to your allies with your inspire courage or inspire defense composition.
inputRequired: The next inspire courage or inspire defense you cast with will have a bonus depending on your Performance check.
desc: You call upon your muse to greatly increase the benefits you provide to your allies with your inspire courage or inspire defense composition. If your next action is to cast inspire courage or inspire defense, attempt a Performance check. The DC is usually a very hard DC of a level equal to that of the highest-level target of your composition, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances. The effect of your inspire courage or inspire defense composition depends on the result of your check.
critsuccess: The status bonus from your inspire courage or inspire defense increases to +3.
success: The status bonus from inspire courage or inspire defense increases to +2.
failure: Your inspire courage or inspire defense provides only its normal bonus of +1, but you don't spend the Focus Point for casting this spell.

name: Invisibility Cloak
shortDesc: You become invisible.
desc: <var>var1</var>You become invisible, with the same restrictions as the 2nd-level invisibility spell.

heightened.desc: The duration increases to 10 minutes.
The duration increases to 1 hour.

name: Know the Enemy
shortDesc: Use a Recall Knowledge action, rolling the appropriate skill check to identify the triggering creature's abilities.

name: Life Siphon
shortDesc: You use some of the spell's magic to heal yourself.
inputRequired: You regain 1d8 Hit Points per level of the spell.
trigger: You expend one of your wizard spell slots to cast a wizard spell of the necromancy school.
desc: You use some of the spell's magic to heal yourself, regaining |dice=1d8| 1d8 Hit Points per level of the spell.

name: Localized Quake
shortDesc: You shake the earth, toppling nearby creatures.

name: Lucky Break
shortDesc: Reroll the saving throw and use the better result.

name: Malignant Sustenance
shortDesc: You embed a seed of negative energy in an undead creature, restoring its unnatural vigor.

name: Mystic Beacon
shortDesc: The next damaging or healing spell the target casts before the start of your next turn deals damage or restores Hit Points as if the spell were heightened 1 level higher than its actual level.

name: Nature's Bounty
shortDesc: A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable appears in your open hand.

name: Ordained Purpose
shortDesc: You call upon the authority of cosmic forces of order, overwhelming creatures with remorse and agony for acting outside of their station and purpose.

name: Overflowing Sorrow
shortDesc: Sadness flows out of you into nearby creatures, blotting out any other thoughts they had.

name: Perfected Form
shortDesc: Reroll the saving throw and use the better result.

name: Positive Luminance
shortDesc: Drawing life force into yourself, you become a beacon of positive energy.

shortDesc: Your deity blesses base metals to transform them into precious materials.

name: Protector's Sphere
shortDesc: A protective aura emanates out from you, safeguarding you and your allies.

name: Pulse of the City
shortDesc: You tap into the zeitgeist of the nearest settlement in range (if any).

name: Rebuke Death
shortDesc: You snatch creatures from the jaws of death.

name: Remember the Lost
shortDesc: You call upon the lost and forgotten, assailing your foes' minds with the memories of those who died with a grievance toward them.

name: Retributive Pain
shortDesc: You vengefully reflect your pain upon your tormentor.

name: Roar of the Wyrm
shortDesc: You channel the might of dragons into your voice, letting out a roar that engenders respect in dragonkind but that instills fear in most other creatures.

shortDesc: You ensure a secret remains safe from prying spies.

name: Shared Nightmare
shortDesc: Merging minds with the target, you swap disorienting visions from one another's nightmares.

name: Shifting Form
shortDesc: You morph to gain an ability of your choice.
desc:
You gain one of the following abilities of your choice. You can Dismiss this spell.

You gain a 20-foot status bonus to your Speed.
You gain a climb or swim Speed equal to half your Speed.
You gain darkvision.
You gain a pair of claws. These are agile finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage.
You gain scent 60 feet (imprecise).

name: Stasis
shortDesc: The flow of time congeals around an object or creature, holding it in place.

name: Stormwind Flight
shortDesc: Powerful winds carry you smoothly through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
desc: Powerful winds carry you smoothly through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. <var>var1</var>When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as feather fall.

heightened.desc: When you fly using stormwind flight, you don't count flying against the wind as difficult terrain.

descs.value: When you fly using stormwind flight, you don't count flying against the wind as difficult terrain.

name: Swarm Form
shortDesc: You discorporate into a swarm of Tiny creatures.

name: Take its Course
shortDesc: When someone has overindulged, you can hasten them past the worst of their affliction or intensify their misery.

name: Tempt Fate
shortDesc: You twist the forces of fate to make a moment dire or uneventful, with no in-between.

name: Tireless Worker
shortDesc: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: clumsy, encumbered, enfeebled, or fatigued.

name: Traveler's Transit
shortDesc: You add power to your muscles, allowing you to swim or climb walls with ease.

name: Trickster's Twin
shortDesc: You rarely settle for being in just one place.

name: Unity
shortDesc: You put up a united defense.

name: Vigilant Eye
shortDesc: You create an invisible eye sensor, as clairvoyance.
inputRequired: To extend the duration of the spell, either change the duration of the condition, or cast the spell again.
desc:
You create an invisible eye sensor, as clairvoyance.

When created, this eye must be in your line of sight. When the spell's duration ends, you can spend 1 Focus Point as a free action to extend the duration for another hour, though as normal, it ends immediately during your next daily preparations.

name: Wild Winds Stance
shortDesc: You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance.
desc:
You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance. You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

name: Word of Freedom
shortDesc: You utter a liberating word of power that frees a creature.

name: Zeal for Battle
shortDesc: You stoke the righteous anger within yourself and an ally.

name: Abyssal Wrath
shortDesc: You evoke the energy of an Abyssal realm.
desc: You evoke the energy of an Abyssal realm. The damage types of the spell (one energy and one physical) are based on the result of rolling |dice=1d4| 1d4 on the table below. Abyssal Wrath 1: Realm Skies; Manifestation Bolts and lightning and flying debris; Damage Type Bludgeoning and electricity 2: Realm Depths; Manifestation Acid and demonic shells; Damage Type Acid and slashing 3: Realm Frozen; Manifestation Frigid air and ice; Damage Type Bludgeoning and cold 4: Realm Volcanic; Manifestation Jagged volcanic rocks and magma; Damage Type Fire and piercing You deal |dice=var1 + var1| var1 damage of each of the corresponding damage types to each creature in the cone (var2 total damage).

heightened.desc: The damage for each type increases by 1d6.

name: Arcane Countermeasure
shortDesc: You undermine the target spell, making it easier to defend against.
targets: the spell cast by the triggering creature
trigger: A creature within range that you can see Casts a Spell.
desc:
You undermine the target spell, making it easier to defend against. You reduce the spell's level by 1, and targets of the spell gain a +2 status bonus to any saving throws, skill checks, AC, or DC against it.

You can't reduce the spell's level below its minimum. For example, a 5th-level cone of cold would remain 5th-level, but a 5th-level fireball would become 4th-level. Targets still gain all the other benefits, even if you don't reduce the spell's level.

name: Celestial Brand
shortDesc: A blazing symbol appears on the target, marking it for divine justice.
desc: A blazing symbol appears on the target, marking it to face divine justice. This is a curse and can be removed only by effects that specifically target curses. You and your allies receive a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls and skill checks against it. Anytime a good creature damages it, the good creature deals an additional |dice=var1| <var>var1</var> good damage. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

heightened.desc: The good damage increases by 1.

name: Dragon Wings
shortDesc: Leathery wings sprout from your back, giving you a fly Speed of 60 feet or your Speed, whichever is faster.
inputRequired: If you want to add the effects of dragon claws, cast dragon claws separately and change the duration as needed.
desc: <var>var1</var>Leathery wings sprout from your back, giving you a fly Speed of 60 feet or your Speed, whichever is faster. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as feather fall. You can increase the Focus Point cost by 1 to gain the effects of dragon claws as long as the wings last.

heightened.desc: The duration increases to 10 minutes.

name: Elemental Blast
shortDesc: You gather elemental energy and blast your foes in one of the various listed shapes of your choosing, dealing 8d6 bludgeoning damage (or fire damage if your element is fire).
desc: You gather elemental energy and blast your foes in one of the various listed shapes of your choosing, dealing |dice=var1 B or Fire| <var>var1</var> bludgeoning damage (or fire damage if your element is fire). This spell has your element's trait.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 2d6.

name: Fey Glamour
shortDesc: You call upon fey glamours to cloak an area or the targets in illusion.
desc: You call upon fey glamours to cloak an area or the targets in illusion. This has the effect of either illusory scene on the area or veil on the creatures, as if heightened to a level 1 level lower than fey glamour, using fey glamour's range and duration.

name: Grasping Grave
shortDesc: Hundreds of skeletal arms erupt from the ground in the area, clawing at creatures within and attempting to hold them in place.
desc: Hundreds of skeletal arms erupt from the ground in the area, clawing at creatures within and attempting to hold them in place. The skeletal arms deal |dice=var1 S| <var>var1</var> slashing damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a Reflex save.
success: The creature takes half damage.
failure: The creature takes full damage and a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.
critfailure: The creature takes double damage and is immobilized for 1 round or until it Escapes.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 2d6.

name: Hellfire Plume
shortDesc: You call forth a plume of hellfire that erupts from below, dealing 4d6 fire damage and 4d6 evil damage.
desc: You call forth a plume of hellfire that erupts from below, dealing |dice=var1 Fire + var1 Evil| <var>var1</var> fire damage and <var>var1</var> evil damage.

heightened.desc: The fire damage increases by 1d6, and the evil damage increases by 1d6.

name: House of Imaginary Walls
shortDesc: You mime creating an invisible stretch of wall adjacent to you and within your reach.
desc: You mime creating an invisible 10-foot-by-10-foot stretch of wall adjacent to you and within your reach. The wall is solid to those creatures that don't disbelieve it, even incorporeal creatures. You and your allies can voluntarily believe the wall exists to continue to treat it as solid, for instance to climb onto it. A creature that disbelieves the illusion is temporarily immune to your house of imaginary walls for 1 minute. The wall doesn't block creatures that didn't see your visual performance, nor does it block objects. The wall has AC 10, Hardness equal to double the spell's level, and HP equal to quadruple the spell's level.

name: Litany Against Sloth
shortDesc: Your litany rails against the sin of sloth, interfering with the target's ability to react.

name: Unusual Anatomy
shortDesc: You transform your flesh and organs into a bizarre amalgam of glistening skin, rough scales, tufts of hair, and tumorous protuberances.
desc:
You transform your flesh and organs into a bizarre amalgam of glistening skin, rough scales, tufts of hair, and tumorous protuberances. This has three effects:

You gain resistance <var>var1</var> to precision damage and resistance <var>var1</var> to extra damage from critical hits. If the resistance is greater than the extra damage, it reduces the extra damage to 0 but doesn't reduce the attack's normal damage.
You gain darkvision.
Acid oozes from your skin. Any creature that hits you with an unarmed attack or with a non-reach melee weapon takes |dice=var2 Acid| <var>var2</var> acid damage.

heightened.desc: The resistances increase by 5, and the acid damage increases by 1d6.

name: Wind Jump
shortDesc: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
desc: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. You must end your turn on solid ground, or you fall.<var>var1</var>

heightened.desc: At the end of your turn, you can attempt a DC 30 Acrobatics check to find purchase in midair. If you succeed, you don't fall.

descs.value: At the end of your turn, you can attempt a DC 30 Acrobatics check to find purchase in midair. If you succeed, you don't fall.

name: You're Mine
shortDesc: You manipulate the target's emotions, potentially allowing you to control it for a brief instant.
desc: You manipulate the target's emotions, potentially allowing you to control it for a brief instant. The target must attempt a Will save.
success: The target is stunned 1.
failure: <var>var1</var>
critfailure: <var>var2</var>

heightened.desc: On a failure, the target is controlled for 1 round. On a critical failure, the target is controlled for up to 1 minute; it receives a new Will save at the end of each of its turns, and on a success, the spell ends.

descs.value: On the target's next turn, it's stunned 1 and you partially control it, causing it to take a single action of your choice. If it has actions left, it can act normally.
The target is controlled for 1 round.
The target is controlled for 1 round.
The target is controlled for up to 1 minute; it receives a new Will save at the end of each of its turns, and on a success, the spell ends.

name: Champion's Sacrifice
shortDesc: You form a link with an ally, allowing you to take harm in their stead.

name: Primal Summons
shortDesc: You enhance a summoned creature with the power of the elements.
desc: You enhance a summoned creature with the power of the elements. If your next action is to cast either summon animal or summon plant or fungus, choose air, earth, fire, or water, and the creature you summon gains the corresponding abilities. Air The creature gains a fly Speed of 60 feet. Earth The creature gains a burrow Speed of 20 feet, reduces its land Speed by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet), and gains resistance 5 to physical damage. Fire The creature's attacks deal |dice=1d6| 1d6 extra fire damage, and it gains resistance 10 to fire and weakness 5 to cold and water. Water The creature gains a swim Speed of 60 feet, can spend 1 action after a melee attack to attempt a Shove (ignoring multiple attack penalty), and gains resistance 5 to fire.

name: Allegro
shortDesc: You perform rapidly, speeding up your ally.
desc: You perform rapidly, speeding up your ally. The ally becomes quickened and can use the additional action to Strike, Stride, or Step.

name: Litany of Righteousness
shortDesc: Your litany denounces an evildoer, rendering it susceptible to the powers of good.

name: Soothing Ballad
shortDesc: You draw upon your muse to soothe your allies.
desc:
You draw upon your muse to soothe your allies. Choose one of the following three effects:

The spell attempts to counteract fear effects on the targets.
The spell attempts to counteract effects imposing paralysis on the targets.
The spell restores |dice=var1| <var>var1</var> Hit Points to the targets.

heightened.desc: When used to heal, soothing ballad restores 1d8 more Hit Points.

name: Impaling Briars
shortDesc: The ground within the area transforms into a mass of dangerous briars that assault and impede your foes.
desc: The ground within the area transforms into a mass of dangerous briars that assault and impede your foes. The first time you Sustain this Spell each round, you can select one of the following effects to occur in the area. Ensnare The briars clump around your foes, attempting to hold them in place. A foe within the area (or flying at most 20 feet above the area) must attempt a Reflex save. On a failure, it takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds for 1 round, and on a critical failure, it is immobilized for 1 round unless it Escapes. Impede The briars twist and writhe, making the entire area difficult terrain. Wall A wall of thorns appears in the area, lasting for 1 round. The wall is greater difficult terrain instead of difficult terrain. In addition, once per round you can direct the briars to impale any target in the area (or flying up to 20 feet above the area) that you can see by using a single action, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits. Make a spell attack roll. On a success, the target takes |dice=10d6 P| 10d6 piercing damage and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds for 1 round; on a critical success, the target is immobilized for 1 round unless it Escapes.

name: Quivering Palm
shortDesc: Your strikes can kill foes with a precise and powerful strike.
desc:
Make a melee unarmed Strike. If you hit and the target is alive, anytime during the duration, you can spend a single action, which has the auditory and concentrate traits, to speak a word of death that could instantly slay it. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

If you cast quivering palm again, the effects of any quivering palm you had previously cast end.
critsuccess: The target survives, the spell ends, and the target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.
success: The target is stunned 1 and takes |dice=var1| <var>var1</var> damage, the spell ends, and the target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.
failure: The target is stunned 3 and takes |dice=var2| <var>var2</var> damage. The spell's duration continues, but the target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours against being killed by quivering palm.
critfailure: The target dies.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 10 on a failure, or 5 on a success.

name: Empty Body
shortDesc: You turn ethereal, with the effects of ethereal jaunt, but you don't need to concentrate.
desc: You turn ethereal, with the effects of ethereal jaunt, but you don't need to concentrate.

name: Storm Lord
shortDesc: The sky above you darkens in a matter of moments, swirling with ominous clouds punctuated by flashes of lighting.
desc: The sky above you darkens in a matter of moments, swirling with ominous clouds punctuated by flashes of lighting. The first time you Sustain this Spell each round, you can select one of the following effects to occur in the area. Calm No additional effect. Fog Heavy fog rolls in, concealing the area with the effects of obscuring mist. Rain Torrential rain falls from the sky, dousing ordinary flames. Creatures in the area take a -2 circumstance penalty to Acrobatics and Perception checks. Wind Powerful winds buffet the area in all directions. Ranged attacks take a -4 circumstance penalty, and all flying is against the wind and counts as moving through difficult terrain. In addition, once per round you can use a single action, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits, to call down a bolt of lightning, striking any target in range that you can see. You deal |dice=10d6 Electricity| 10d6 electricity damage to the target; it must attempt a basic Reflex save. On a failure, it is also deafened for 1 round.

name: Apex Companion
shortDesc: Transform your animal companion into an apex form.
desc:
You focus on the energies of all members of your animal companion's species, transforming your animal companion into its apex battle form. Your animal companion gains the following statistics and abilities while in its apex form.

Your animal companion becomes Huge and its attacks have 15-foot reach. It must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost.
30 temporary Hit Points.
Darkvision.
Your animal companion's attack's damage dice increase by one step, and its attack gains the deadly d12 trait.
+10-foot status bonus to its Speeds.
Ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain.

name: Fatal Aria
shortDesc: You perform music so perfect that the target may die of joy or sorrow.
desc: You perform music so perfect that the target may die of joy or sorrow. Once targeted, the creature becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute. The effect of the spell depends on the target's level and current Hit Points. 16th or Lower The target dies instantly. 17th If the target has 50 Hit Points or fewer, it dies instantly; otherwise, it drops to 0 Hit Points and becomes dying 1. 18th or Higher The target takes 50 damage. If this brings it to 0 Hit Points, it dies instantly.

name: Hero's Defiance
shortDesc: You shout in defiance, filling you with a sudden burst of healing.
desc: You shout in defiance, filling you with a sudden burst of healing. Just before applying the attack's damage, you recover |dice=10d4 + 20| 10d4+20 Hit Points. If this is enough to prevent the attack from bringing you to 0 Hit Points, you don't become unconscious or dying. Either way, cheating death is difficult, and you can't use hero's defiance again until you Refocus or the next time you prepare. Hero's defiance cannot be used against effects with the death trait or that would leave no remains, such as disintegrate.

name: Song of the Fallen
shortDesc: Rouse the dead or smite the undead.
targets: up to 4 dead creatures or up to 4 undead creatures
desc:
You chant a dirge or an elegy that either rouses the dead to action or reminds undead that they should lay to rest.

If you target dead creatures, the bodies animate and can continue acting as if they were alive. A creature animated in this way has 60 temporary Hit Points. The animated creatures are slowed 1 but can otherwise act normally. Creatures animated with this spell die again once the spell ends.

If you target undead creatures, each undead must attempt a basic Will save.
critsuccess: The undead takes |dice=5d6 Positive| 5d6 positive damage.
success: The undead takes |dice=10d6 Positive| 10d6 positive damage and is slowed 1 for 1 round.
failure: The undead takes |dice=100 Positive| 100 positive damage and is slowed 1 for 1 minute.
critfailure: The undead is destroyed.

name: Acid Splash
shortDesc: Damage creatures with acid.
desc: You splash a glob of acid that splatters creatures and objects alike. Make a spell attack. If you hit, you deal |dice=var4 Acid + var2 Acid Splash| <var>var1</var> acid damage plus <var>var2</var> splash acid damage. On a critical success, the target also takes <var>var3</var> persistent acid damage.

heightened.desc: The initial damage increases to 1d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, and the persistent damage increases to 2.
The initial damage increases to 2d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, the persistent damage increases to 3, and the splash damage increases to 2.
The initial damage increases to 3d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, the persistent damage increases to 4, and the splash damage increases to 3.
The initial damage increases to 4d6 + your spellcasting ability modifier, the persistent damage increases to 5, and the splash damage increases to 4.

name: Chill Touch
shortDesc: Your touch hurts the living or disorients undead.
desc: Siphoning negative energy into yourself, your hand radiates a pale darkness. Your touch weakens the living and disorients undead, possibly even causing them to flee. The effect depends on whether the target is living or undead. Living Creature The spell deals negative damage equal to |dice=var1 + spellmod Negative| var1 plus your spellcasting modifier. The target attempts a basic Fortitude save, but is also enfeebled 1 for 1 round on a critical failure. Undead Creature The target is flat-footed for 1 round on a failed Fortitude save. On a critical failure, the target is also fleeing for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Will save.

heightened.desc: The negative damage to living creatures increases by 1d4.

name: Dancing Lights
shortDesc: Create four floating lights you can move.
desc: You create up to four floating lights, no two of which are more than 10 feet apart. Each sheds light like a torch. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move any number of lights up to 60 feet. Each light must remain within 120 feet of you and within 10 feet of all others, or it winks out.

name: Daze
shortDesc: Damage a creature's mind and possibly stun it.
desc: You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to |dice=var1 + spellmod Mental| <var>var1</var>your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also stunned 1.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 1d6.

name: Detect Magic
shortDesc: Sense whether magic is nearby.
desc:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. <var>var1</var> You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the level of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

heightened.desc: You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

descs.value: You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic.
You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range and pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic that the spell detects. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that). If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

name: Disrupt Undead
shortDesc: Damage undead with positive energy.
desc: You lance the target with energy. You deal |dice=var1 + spellmod Positive| <var>var1</var> positive damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier. The target must attempt a basic Fortitude save. If the creature critically fails the save, it is also enfeebled 1 for 1 round.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 1d6.

name: Divine Lance
shortDesc: Throw divine energy that damages based on your deity's alignment.
desc: You unleash a beam of divine energy. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or if your deity is true neutral. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the target's AC. On a hit, the target takes damage of the chosen alignment type equal to |dice=var1 + spellmod| <var>var1</var> + your spellcasting ability modifier (double damage on a critical hit). The spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 1d4.

name: Electric Arc
shortDesc: Zap one or two creatures with lightning.
desc: An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. You deal electricity damage equal to |dice=var1 + spellmod Electricity| <var>var1</var> plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 1d4.

name: Forbidding Ward
shortDesc: Protect an ally against one specific enemy.
desc: You ward an ally against the attacks and hostile spells from the target enemy. The target ally gains a <var>var1</var> status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the target enemy's attacks, spells, and other effects.

heightened.desc: The status bonus increases to +2.

name: Ghost Sound
shortDesc: Make false sounds.
desc: <var>var1</var>You create an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting. The sounds emanate from a square you designate within range. You can't create intelligible words or other intricate sounds (such as music).

heightened.desc: The range increases to 60 feet.
The range increases to 120 feet.

name: Guidance
shortDesc: Divine guidance improves one roll.
duration: until the start of your next turn
desc: You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

name: Join Pasts
shortDesc: Share thoughts and experiences with allies.
desc: <var>var1</var>With touches to the targets' foreheads, you bring them into mental communion. The targets can share thoughts and experiences, but not words. When one target attempts to Recall Knowledge, the other can Aid the first target's skill check, using any Lore skill (even if that Lore wouldn't normally apply) without having made any preparations to Aid.

heightened.desc: You can touch one additional target to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.

descs.value: You can touch one additional target to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.
You can touch two additional targets to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.
You can touch three additional targets to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.
You can touch four additional targets to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.
You can touch five additional targets to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.
You can touch six additional targets to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.
You can touch seven additional targets to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.
You can touch eight additional targets to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.
You can touch nine additional targets to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to Aid the target who is attempting to Recall Knowledge.

name: Know Direction
shortDesc: Find true north.
desc: In your mind's eye, you see a path northward. You immediately know which direction is north (if it exists at your current location). <var>var1</var>

heightened.desc: You can instead know the direction to a familiar location, such as a previous home or a favorite tavern.

descs.value: You can instead know the direction to a familiar location, such as a previous home or a favorite tavern.

name: Light
shortDesc: Make an object glow.
targets: 1 object of 1 Bulk or less, either unattended or possessed by you or a willing ally
duration: until the next time you make your daily preparations
desc: The object glows, casting bright light in a <var>var1</var>-foot radius (and dim light for the next <var>var2</var> feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

heightened.desc: The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

name: Mage Hand
shortDesc: Command a floating hand to move an object.
targets: 1 unattended object of light Bulk or less
desc: <var>var1</var>You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet. Because you're levitating the object, you can move it in any direction. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

heightened.desc: You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.
The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.
The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

descs.value: You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.
The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.
The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

name: Message
shortDesc: Speak a message to a distant creature, who can reply.
desc: <var>var1</var>You mouth words quietly, but instead of coming out of your mouth, they're transferred directly to the ears of the target. While others can't hear your words any better than if you normally mouthed them, the target can hear your words as if they were standing next to you. The target can give a brief response as a reaction, or as a free action on their next turn if they wish, but they must be able to see you and be within range to do so. If they respond, their response is delivered directly to your ear, just like the original message.

heightened.desc: The spell's range increases to 500 feet.

descs.value: The spell's range increases to 500 feet.

name: Prestidigitation
shortDesc: Perform a minor magical trick.
desc:
The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose one of four options.

Cook: Cool, warm, or flavor 1 pound of nonliving material.
Lift: Slowly lift an unattended object of light Bulk or less 1 foot off the ground.
Make: Create a temporary object of negligible Bulk, made of congealed magical substance. The object looks crude and artificial and is extremely fragile - it can't be used as a tool, weapon, or spell component.
Tidy: Color, clean, or soil an object of light Bulk or less. You can affect an object of 1 Bulk with 10 rounds of concentration, and a larger object a 1 minute per Bulk.

Prestidigitation can't deal damage or cause adverse conditions. Any actual change to an object (beyond what is noted above) persists only as long as you Sustain the Spell.

name: Produce Flame
shortDesc: Kindle small flames to attack close or at range.
desc: A small ball of flame appears in the palm of your hand, and you lash out with it either in melee or at range. Make a spell attack roll against your target's AC. This is normally a ranged attack, but you can also make a melee attack against a creature in your unarmed reach. On a success, you deal |dice=var1 + spellmod Fire| <var>var1</var> fire damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier. On a critical success, the target takes double damage and |dice=var2 Persistent Fire| <var>var2</var> persistent fire damage.

heightened.desc: Increase the damage by 1d4 and the persistent damage on a critical hit by 1d4.

name: Ray of Frost
shortDesc: Damage a creature with cold.
desc: You blast an icy ray. Make a spell attack roll. The ray deals cold damage equal to |dice=var1 + spellmod Cold| <var>var1</var> plus your spellcasting ability modifier.
critsuccess: The target takes double damage and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.
success: The target takes normal damage.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 1d4.

name: Read Aura
shortDesc: Detect if an object is magical, and determine the school of its magic.
desc:
<var>var1</var>You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the level of your read aura spell.

heightened.desc: You can target up to 10 objects.
You can target any number of objects.

descs.value: You can target up to 10 objects.
You can target any number of objects.

name: Shield
shortDesc: A shield of magical force blocks attacks and magic missiles.
duration: until the start of your next turn
desc:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness <var>var1</var>. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the magic missile spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

heightened.desc: The shield has Hardness 10.
The shield has Hardness 15.
The shield has Hardness 20.
The shield has Hardness 25.

name: Sigil
shortDesc: Leave a magical mark.
desc: You harmlessly place your unique magical sigil, which is about 1 square inch in size, on the targeted creature or object. The mark can be visible or invisible, and you can change it from one state to another by using an Interact action to touch the target. The mark can be scrubbed or scraped off with 5 minutes of work. <var>var1</var>

heightened.desc: The sigil instead fades after 1 month.
The sigil instead fades after 1 year.
The sigil never fades.

descs.value: If it's on a creature, it fades naturally over the course of a week.
If it's on a creature, it fades naturally over the course of 1 month.
If it's on a creature, it fades naturally over the course of 1 year.

name: Stabilize
shortDesc: Stabilize a dying creature.
desc: Positive energy shuts death's door. The target loses the dying condition, though it remains unconscious at 0 Hit Points.

name: Tanglefoot
shortDesc: Conjure a vine to entangle a creature.
desc: A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.
critsuccess: The target gains the immobilized condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for <var>var1</var>. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the immobilized condition.
success: The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for <var>var1</var>. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.
failure: The target is unaffected.

heightened.desc: The effects last for 2 rounds.
The effects last for 1 minute.

name: Telekinetic Projectile
shortDesc: Fling an object at a creature.
desc: You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage - as appropriate for the object you hurled - equal to |dice=var1 + spellmod B/P/S| <var>var1</var> plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.
success: You deal full damage.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 1d6.

name: Acidic Burst
shortDesc: You create a shell of acid around yourself that immediately bursts outward.
desc: You create a shell of acid around yourself that immediately bursts outward, dealing |dice=var1 Acid| <var>var1</var> acid damage to each creature in the area.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 2d6.

name: Agitate
shortDesc: You send the target's mind and body into overdrive, forcing it to become restless and hyperactive.
desc: You send the target's mind and body into overdrive, forcing it to become restless and hyperactive. During the duration, the target must Stride at least once each turn or take |dice=var1 Mental| <var>var1</var> mental damage that turn. The duration of this effect depends on the target's Will save.
success: The duration is 1 round.
failure: The duration is 2 rounds.
critfailure: The duration is 4 rounds.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 2d8.

name: Air Bubble
shortDesc: React to create air for a creature to breathe.
trigger: A creature within range enters an environment where it can't breathe.
desc: A bubble of pure air appears around the target's head, allowing it to breathe normally. The effect ends as soon as the target returns to an environment where it can breathe normally.

name: Alarm
shortDesc: Be alerted if a creature enters a warded area.
desc: You ward an area to alert you when creatures enter without your permission. When you cast alarm, select a password. Whenever a Small or larger corporeal creature enters the spell's area without speaking the password, alarm sends your choice of a mental alert (in which case the spell gains the mental trait) or an audible alarm with the sound and volume of a hand bell (in which case the spell gains the auditory trait). <var>var1</var>Either option automatically awakens you, and the bell allows each creature in the area to attempt a DC 15 Perception check to wake up. A creature aware of the alarm must succeed at a Stealth check against the spell's DC or trigger the spell when moving into the area.

heightened.desc: You can specify criteria for which creatures sound the alarm spell - for instance, orcs or masked people.

descs.value: You can specify criteria for which creatures sound the alarm spell - for instance, orcs or masked people.

name: Ant Haul
shortDesc: Target can carry more.
desc: You reinforce the target's musculoskeletal system to bear more weight. The target can carry 3 more Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered and up to a maximum of 6 more Bulk.

name: Anticipate Peril
shortDesc: You grant the target brief foresight.
desc: You grant the target brief foresight. The target gains a <var>var1</var> status bonus to its next initiative roll, after which the spell ends.

heightened.desc: The status bonus increases by 1, to a maximum of +4 at 7th level.

name: Bane
shortDesc: Weaken enemies' attacks in an aura around you.
desc: You fill the minds of your enemies with doubt. Targets that fail their Will saves take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls as long as they are in the area. Once per turn, starting the turn after you cast bane, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet and force enemies in the area that weren't yet affected to attempt another saving throw. Bane can counteract bless.

name: Befuddle
shortDesc: You sow seeds of confusion in your target's mind, causing their actions and thoughts to become clumsy.
desc: You sow seeds of confusion in your target's mind, causing their actions and thoughts to become clumsy.
success: The target is clumsy 1 and stupefied 1.
failure: The target is clumsy 2 and stupefied 2.
critfailure: The target is clumsy 3, stupefied 3, and confused.

name: Bless
shortDesc: Strengthen allies' attacks in an aura around you.
targets: you and allies in the area
desc: Blessings from beyond help your companions strike true. You and your allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls. Once per turn, starting the turn after you cast bless, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet. Bless can counteract bane.

name: Burning Hands
shortDesc: A small cone of flame rushes from your hands.
desc: Gouts of flame rush from your hands. You deal |dice=var1 Fire| <var>var1</var> fire damage to creatures in the area.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 2d6.

name: Charm
shortDesc: A humanoid becomes more friendly to you.
desc:
To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it. <var>var1</var>

You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means.
critsuccess: The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.
success: The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charm, unless it identifies the spell (see Identifying Spells on page 305).
failure: The target's attitude becomes friendly toward you. If it was friendly, it becomes helpful. It can't use hostile actions against you.
critfailure: The target's attitude becomes helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you.

heightened.desc: The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.
The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

descs.value: The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.
The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

name: Chilling Spray
shortDesc: A cone of icy shards bursts from your spread hands and coats the target in a layer of frost.
desc: A cone of icy shards bursts from your spread hands and coats the target in a layer of frost. You deal |dice=var1 Cold| <var>var1</var> cold damage to creatures in the area; they must each attempt a Reflex save.
success: The creature takes half damage.
failure: The creature takes full damage and takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 2 rounds.
critfailure: The creature takes double damage and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 2 rounds.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 2d4.

name: Color Spray
shortDesc: Swirling colors dazzle or stun creatures.
desc: Swirling colors affect viewers based on their Will saves.
success: The creature is dazzled for 1 round.
failure: The creature is stunned 1, blinded for 1 round, and dazzled for 1 minute.
critfailure: The creature is stunned for 1 round and blinded for 1 minute.

name: Command
shortDesc: Bid a creature to approach, run, release something, lie prone, or stand up.
duration: until the end of the target's next turn
desc: You shout a command that's hard to ignore. <var>var1</var>You can command the target to approach you, run away (as if it had the fleeing condition), release what it's holding, drop prone, or stand in place. It can't Delay or take any reactions until it has obeyed your command. The effects depend on the target's Will save.
success: The creature is unaffected.
failure: For the first action on its next turn, the creature must use a single action to do as you command.
critfailure: The target must use all its actions on its next turn to obey your command.

heightened.desc: You can target up to 10 creatures.

descs.value: You can target up to 10 creatures.

name: Create Water
shortDesc: Conjure 2 gallons of water.
desc: As you cup your hands, water begins to flow forth from them. You create 2 gallons of water. If no one drinks it, it evaporates after 1 day.

name: Detect Alignment
shortDesc: See auras of a chosen alignment.
desc:
Your eyes glow as you sense aligned auras. Choose chaotic, evil, good, or lawful. You detect auras of that alignment. <var>var1</var> You can choose not to detect creatures or effects you're aware have that alignment.

Only creatures of 6th level or higher - unless divine spellcasters, undead, or beings from the Outer Sphere - have alignment auras.

heightened.desc: You learn each aura's location and strength.

descs.value: You receive no information beyond presence or absence.
You learn each aura's location and strength.

name: Detect Poison
shortDesc: Determine whether an object or creature is poisonous or venomous.
desc: You detect whether a creature is venomous or poisonous, or if an object is poison or has been poisoned. <var>var1</var> Certain substances, like lead and alcohol, are poisons and so mask other poisons.

heightened.desc: You learn the number and types of poison.

descs.value: You do not ascertain whether the target is poisonous in multiple ways, nor do you learn the type or types of poison.
You learn the number and types of poison.

name: Disrupting Weapons
shortDesc: Weapons deal positive damage to undead.
targets: up to two weapons, each of which must be wielded by you or a willing ally, or else unattended
desc: <var>var1</var>You infuse weapons with positive energy. Attacks with these weapons deal an extra <var>var2</var> positive damage to undead.

heightened.desc: The damage increases to 2d4 damage.
Target up to three weapons, and the damage increases to 3d4 damage.

name: Endure
shortDesc: You invigorate the touched creature's mind and urge it to press on.
desc: You invigorate the touched creature's mind and urge it to press on. You grant the touched creature <var>var1</var> temporary Hit Points.

heightened.desc: Increase the temporary Hit Points by 5.

name: Exchange Image
shortDesc: Trade appearances with the target.
desc: To mislead pursuers, the Lacunafex developed the means to swap visages. You trade appearances with the target, with the effects depending on the result of the target's Will saving throw. Willing and unconscious targets automatically critically fail this saving throw.
success: You take on the target's appearance, and they take yours. This has the same effects as a 1st-level illusory disguise spell, except that the target can't Dismiss the disguise. The duration is 1 minute or until Dismissed.
failure: As success, but the duration is 1 hour or until Dismissed.
critfailure: As success, but the duration is 24 hours.

name: Fear
shortDesc: Frighten a creature, possibly making it flee.
desc: <var>var1</var>You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.
success: The target is frightened 1.
failure: The target is frightened 2.
critfailure: The target is frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 round.

heightened.desc: You can target up to five creatures.

descs.value: You can target up to five creatures.

name: Feather Fall
shortDesc: React to slow a creature's fall.
trigger: a creature within range is falling
desc: You cause the air itself to arrest a fall. The target's fall slows to 60 feet per round, and the portion of the fall during the spell's duration doesn't count when calculating falling damage. If the target reaches the ground while the spell is in effect, it takes no damage from the fall. The spell ends as soon as the target lands.

name: Fleet Step
shortDesc: Make your Speed much faster.
desc: You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.

name: Floating Disk
shortDesc: A disk of energy follows you, carrying objects.
desc:
A disk of magical force materializes adjacent to you. This disk is 2 feet in diameter and follows 5 feet behind you, floating just above the ground. It holds up to 5 Bulk of objects (though they must be able to fit and balance on its surface). Any objects atop the disk fall to the ground when the spell ends.

The spell ends if a creature tries to ride atop the disk, if the disk is overloaded, if anyone tries to lift or force the disk higher above the ground, or if you move more than 30 feet away from the disk.

name: Goblin Pox
shortDesc: Infect a creature with goblin pox.
desc: Your touch afflicts the target with goblin pox, an irritating allergenic rash. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. Goblin Pox (disease); Level 1. Goblins and goblin dogs are immune. Stage 1 sickened 1 (1 round); Stage 2 sickened 1 and slowed 1 (1 round); Stage 3 sickened 1 and the creature can't reduce its sickened value below 1 (1 day)
success: The target is sickened 1.
failure: The target is afflicted with goblin pox at stage 1.
critfailure: The target is afflicted with goblin pox at stage 2.

name: Grease
shortDesc: Coat a surface or object in slippery grease.
desc: You conjure grease, with effects based on choosing area or target. Area All solid ground in the area is covered with grease. Each creature standing on the greasy surface must succeed at a Reflex save or an Acrobatics check against your spell DC or fall prone. Creatures using an action to move onto the greasy surface during the spell's duration must attempt either a Reflex save or an Acrobatics check to Balance. A creature that Steps or Crawls doesn't have to attempt a check or save. Target If you cast the spell on an unattended object, anyone trying to pick up the object must succeed at an Acrobatics check or Reflex save against your spell DC to do so. If you target an attended object, the creature that has the object must attempt an Acrobatics check or Reflex save. On a failure, the holder or wielder takes a -2 circumstance penalty to all checks that involve using the object; on a critical failure, the holder or wielder releases the item. The object lands in an adjacent square of the GM's choice. If you cast this spell on a worn object, the wearer gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves against attempts to grapple them.

name: Grim Tendrils
shortDesc: Creatures in a line take negative damage and bleed.
desc: Tendrils of darkness curl out from your fingertips and race through the air. You deal |dice=var1 Negative + var2 Persistent Bleed| <var>var1</var> negative damage and <var>var2</var> persistent bleed damage to living creatures in the line. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save.
success: The creature takes half the negative damage and no persistent bleed damage.
failure: The creature takes full damage.
critfailure: The creature takes double negative damage and double persistent bleed damage.

heightened.desc: The negative damage increases by 2d4, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

name: Gust of Wind
shortDesc: Wind blows out fires and knocks back objects and creatures.
duration: until the start of your next turn
desc: A violent wind issues forth from your palm, blowing from the point where you are when you cast the spell to the line's opposite end. The wind extinguishes small non-magical fires, disperses fog and mist, blows objects of light Bulk or less around, and pushes larger objects. Large or smaller creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save. Large or smaller creatures that later move into the gust must attempt the save on entering.
success: The creature can't move against the wind.
failure: The creature is knocked prone. If it was flying, it suffers the effects of critical failure instead.
critfailure: The creature is pushed 30 feet in the wind's direction, knocked prone, and takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage.

name: Harm
shortDesc: Negative energy harms the living or heals the undead, either a single creature or all in a burst.
targets: 1 living creature or 1 willing undead creature
desc: You channel negative energy to harm the living or heal the undead. If the target is a living creature, you deal |dice=var1 Negative| var1 negative damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. If the target is a willing undead creature, you restore |dice=var1| that amount of Hit Points. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters. (somatic) The spell has a range of touch. (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing an undead creature, increase the Hit Points restored by |dice=var1 + var2| var2. (material, verbal, somatic) You disperse negative energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

heightened.desc: The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

name: Heal
shortDesc: Positive energy heals the living or harms the undead, either a single creature or all in a burst.
desc: You channel positive energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore |dice=var1| var1 Hit Points. If the target is undead, you deal |dice=var1 Positive| that amount of positive damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters. (somatic) The spell has a range of touch. (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by |dice=var1 + var2| var2. (material, verbal, somatic) You disperse positive energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the area.

heightened.desc: The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

name: Hydraulic Push
shortDesc: Damage and push a creature with a blast of water.
desc: You call forth a powerful blast of pressurized water that bludgeons the target and knocks it back. Make a ranged spell attack roll.
critsuccess: The target takes |dice=var2 B| <var>var2</var> bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 10 feet.
success: The target takes |dice=var1 B| <var>var1</var> bludgeoning damage and is knocked back 5 feet.

heightened.desc: The damage increases by 2d6.

name: Ill Omen
shortDesc: The target is struck with misfortune, which throws them off balance.
desc: The target is struck with misfortune, which throws them off balance. The target must attempt a Will save.
success: The target is unaffected.
failure: The first time during the duration that the target rolls an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and take the worse result.
critfailure: Every time during the duration that the target rolls an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and take the worse result.

name: Illusory Disguise
shortDesc: Make yourself look like a different creature.
desc:
You create an illusion that causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself. <var>var1</var> You can change the appearance of your clothing and worn items, such as making your armor look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item you remove returns to its true appearance.

Casting illusory disguise counts as setting up a disguise for the Impersonate use of Deception; it ignores any circumstance penalties you might take for disguising yourself as a dissimilar creature, it gives you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through your disguise, and you add your level even if you're untrained. You can Dismiss this spell.

heightened.desc: The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory trait.

You can appear as any creature of the same size, even a specific individual. You must have seen an individual to take on their appearance. The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory trait.

descs.value: The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms.

The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory trait. It doesn't disguise your mannerisms.

You can appear as any creature of the same size, even a specific individual. You must have seen an individual to take on their appearance. The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory trait. It doesn't disguise your mannerisms.

name: Illusory Object
shortDesc: Form a convincing illusion of an object.
desc:
You create an illusory visual image of a stationary object. The entire image must fit within the spell's area. <var>var1</var>

Any creature that touches the image or uses the Seek action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

heightened.desc: Your image makes appropriate sounds, generates normal smells, and feels right to the touch. The spell gains the auditory trait. The duration increases to 1 hour.
As the 2nd-level version, but the duration is unlimited.

descs.value: The object appears to animate naturally, but it doesn't make sounds or generate smells. For example, water would appear to pour down an illusory waterfall, but it would be silent.
Your image makes appropriate sounds, generates normal smells, and feels right to the touch. The spell gains the auditory trait. The duration increases to 1 hour.
Your image makes appropriate sounds, generates normal smells, and feels right to the touch. The spell gains the auditory trait. The duration is unlimited.

name: Imprint Message
shortDesc: Imprint a psychic message into an object.
desc: You project psychic vibrations onto the target object, imprinting it with a short message or emotional theme of your design. This imprinted sensation is revealed to anyone casting object reading on the target object, replacing any emotional events the item was present for. If the object is in the area of a retrocognition spell, the imprinted messages appear as major events in the timeline, but they don't interfere with any other visions. If the object is targeted with read aura of a higher spell level than imprint message, the caster learns that the object has been modified. When you Cast this Spell, any prior vibrations placed in an object by previous castings of imprint message fade.

name: Item Facade
shortDesc: Disguise an item to look perfect or shoddy.
targets: 1 object no more than 10 feet by 10 feet by 10 feet
desc: You make the target object look and feel as though it were in much better or worse physical condition. <var>var1</var>When you cast this spell, decide whether you want to make the object look decrepit or perfect. An item made to look decrepit appears broken and shoddy. An intact item made to look better appears as though it's brand new and highly polished or well maintained. A broken item appears to be intact and functional. Destroyed items can't be affected by this spell. A creature that Interacts with the item can attempt to disbelieve the illusion.

heightened.desc: The duration is 24 hours.
The duration is unlimited.

name: Jump
shortDesc: Make an impressive leap.
desc: <var>var1</var>Your legs surge with strength, ready to leap high and far. You jump 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground. You must land on a space of solid ground within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action.

heightened.desc: The range becomes touch, the target changes to one touched creature, and the duration becomes 1 minute, allowing the target to jump as described whenever it takes the Leap action.

descs.value: The range becomes touch, the target changes to one touched creature, and the duration becomes 1 minute, allowing the target to jump as described whenever it takes the Leap action.

name: Liberating Command
shortDesc: You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place.
desc: You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place. If the target is grabbed, immobilized, or restrained, it can immediately use a reaction to attempt to Escape.

name: Lock
shortDesc: Make a lock hard to open.
targets: 1 lock, or a door or container with a latch
desc:
<var>var1</var>The target's latch mechanism clinks shut, held fast by unseen magical restraints. When you magically lock a target, you set an Athletics and Thievery DC to open it equal to your spell DC or the base lock DC with a +4 status bonus, whichever is higher. Any key or combination that once opened a lock affected by this spell does not do so for the duration of the spell, though the key or combination does grant a +4 circumstance bonus to checks to open the door.

If the target is opened, the spell ends. Assuming the target is not barred or locked in some additional way, you can unlock and open it with an Interact action during which you touch the target. This does not end the spell. You can Dismiss this spell at any time and from any distance.

heightened.desc: The duration increases to unlimited, but you must expend 6 gp worth of gold dust as an additional cost.

descs.value: The duration increases to unlimited, but you must expend 6 gp worth of gold dust as an additional cost.

name: Longstrider
shortDesc: Increase your Speed for an hour.
desc: <var>var1</var>You lengthen your stride beyond what should be possible. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

heightened.desc: The duration increases to 8 hours.

name: Mage Armor
shortDesc: Ward yourself with magical armor.
inputRequired: Mage armor unequips your regular armor. You may need to equip the correct armor after the spell ends.
duration: until the next time you make your daily preparations
desc: You ward yourself with shimmering magical energy, gaining a <var>var1</var> item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. <var>var2</var>While wearing mage armor, you use your unarmored proficiency to calculate your AC.

heightened.desc: You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.
The item bonus to AC increases to +2, and you gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.
The item bonus to AC increases to +2, and you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws.
The item bonus to AC increases to +3, and you gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws.

descs.value: You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.
You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.
You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws.
You gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws.

name: Magic Aura
shortDesc: Change how an item's magic appears to detecting spells.
duration: until the next time you make your daily preparations
desc:
You alter the appearance of an item's magic aura. You can choose to have the target's aura appear as that of common magic item of twice magic aura's level or lower, or to have it register as being under the effects of a spell of your choice of magic aura's level or lower. If the target is magical, you can instead choose to have it appear as entirely non-magical. <var>var1</var>

A caster using detect magic or read aura of an equal or higher spell level can attempt to disbelieve the illusion from magic aura. Magic aura doesn't mask the aura of spells that are 9th level or higher or of items that are 19th level or higher.

heightened.desc: You can target a creature instead of an object. When you do, you can either conceal the auras of all magic items it has or have that creature's aura appear as if it were under the effect of a spell you know.

descs.value: You can target a creature instead of an object. When you do, you can either conceal the auras of all magic items it has or have that creature's aura appear as if it were under the effect of a spell you know.

name: Magic Fang
shortDesc: Make a creature's unarmed attacks magical temporarily.
desc: Choose one of the target's unarmed attacks. You cause that unarmed attack to shine with primal energy. The unarmed attack becomes a +1 striking unarmed attack, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two if it had only one.

name: Magic Missile
shortDesc: Pelt creatures with unerring bolts of magical force.
desc: You send <var>var1</var> of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. Each dart automatically hits and deals |dice=1d4 + 1| 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the number of missiles you shoot by <var>var2</var>, to a maximum of <var>var3</var> missiles for 3 actions. You choose the target for each missile individually. If you shoot more than one missile at the same target, combine the damage before applying bonuses or penalties to damage, resistances, weaknesses, and so forth.

heightened.desc: You shoot one additional missile with each action you spend.

name: Magic Weapon
shortDesc: Make a weapon temporarily magical.
targets: 1 weapon that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally
desc: The weapon glimmers with magic and energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two.

name: Mending
shortDesc: Repair one non-magical item.
targets: non-magical object of light Bulk or less
desc: <var>var1</var>You repair the target item. You restore 5 Hit Points per spell level to the target, potentially removing the broken condition if this repairs it past the item's Broken Threshold. You can't replace lost pieces or repair an object that's been completely destroyed.

heightened.desc: You can target a non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less.
You can target a non-magical object of 2 Bulk or less, or a magical object of 1 Bulk or less.

descs.value: You can target a non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less.
You can target a non-magical object of 2 Bulk or less, or a magical object of 1 Bulk or less.

name: Message Rune
shortDesc: You record a message up to 5 minutes long and inscribe a special rune on any flat unattended surface within reach.
desc: You record a message up to 5 minutes long and inscribe a special rune on any flat unattended surface within reach. The nature of the rune's appearance is up to you, but it is visible to everyone and it must be no smaller than 2 inches in diameter. You also specify a trigger that creatures must meet to activate the rune. For the duration of the spell, creatures who meet the criteria of the trigger can touch the rune to hear the recorded message in their head as though you were speaking to them telepathically. You know when someone is listening to the message, but you do not know who is listening to it. You can Dismiss the spell.

name: Mindlink
shortDesc: Mentally impart 10 minutes' worth of information in an instant.
desc: You link your mind to the target's mind and mentally impart to that target an amount of information in an instant that could otherwise be communicated in 10 minutes.

name: Negate Aroma
shortDesc: Suppress a creature's scent.
desc: <var>var1</var>The target loses its odor, preventing creatures from passively noticing its presence via smell alone, even if the creatures have precise or imprecise scent. A creature attempting a Perception check to Seek with scent and other senses might notice the lack of natural scent. If the target has any abilities that result from its smell, such as an overpowering scent, those abilities are also negated.

heightened.desc: The range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

descs.value: The range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

name: Object Reading
shortDesc: Learn about a significant event surrounding an object.
desc: You place a hand on an object to learn a piece of information about an emotional event that occurred involving the object within <var>var1</var>, determined by the GM. If you cast object reading on the same item multiple times, you can either concentrate on a single event to gain additional pieces of information about that event, or you can gain a piece of information about another emotional event in the applicable time frame.
